0-cost card that #yExhaust when played and vary in effect depending on its type and Luck level.
At the end of their turn, take damage equal to the amount of Constricted stacks.
Whenever a Faith reaches a certain amount (default 10), it Advents into a Kami. When this happens, remove all debuffs on you.
Unique buff that lasts for the entire combat, but only activates when they #yAdvent.
Represents devotion towards a #yKami. Gain enough amount to trigger #yAdvent of #yKami in combat.
Faith towards the sun goddess, #yAmaterasu.
Goddess of the sun. If in #yAdvent, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Faith towards the fire god, #yKagutsuchi. Unlike other #yFaith counters, does not have an upper limit.
God of fire. If in #yAdvent, deal damage equal to your #yFlame #yFaith to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.
Faith towards the wind god, #yTakeminakata.
God of the winds. If in #yAdvent, gain #yFlight at the start of your turn.
Faith towards the thunder god, #yTakemikazuchi.
God of thunder. If in Advent, inflict Divine Punishment on any enemy that hits you. Divine Punishment deals damage at the end of the turn.
Faith towards the storm god, #ySusano-o.
God of storms. If in #yAdvent, your attack deal increased damage.
Faith towards the moon god, #yTsukuyomi.
God of the moon. If in #yAdvent, Upgrade the top card in your draw pile and draw additional cards at the start of your turn.
Faith towards the mountain god, #yOhoyama-tsumi.
God of mountains. If in #yAdvent, gain increased #yBlock from playing cards.
Reduces damage taken from attacks. One stack is removed for each hit received when Flight is present.
